name: ESP32 OTA Web Server
desc: This project demonstrates how to set up an ESP32 for Over-The-Air (OTA) updates using a web server. The ESP32 connects to a specified Wi-Fi network and hosts a web interface for uploading new firmware.

name: ESP32 OTA Web Server Relay
desc: This project demonstrates how to set up an ESP32 for Over-The-Air (OTA) updates using a web server, along with controlling a relay.

name: ESP32 OTA Update Example 2
desc: This project demonstrates how to set up an ESP32 for Over-The-Air (OTA) updates using the Arduino IDE, along with controlling a relay.

name: ESP32 OTA Update Example
desc: This project demonstrates how to set up an ESP32 for Over-The-Air (OTA) updates using the Arduino IDE.

name: Fashion MNIST Classification with CNN
desc: The Fashion MNIST dataset consists of 70,000 grayscale images in 10 categories, with 7,000 images per category.

name: Resume
desc: Computer engineer specializing in hardware and software programming. Experienced with ESP32 and STM32 microcontrollers.

name: Send Command LoRa ESP32
desc: This project involves the implementation of a LoRa communication system using the RH_RF95 library.

name: Turbine Dynamics Simulation
desc: This project simulates the dynamics of a turbine under different operational conditions.

name: Stock Price Prediction using SimpleRNN
desc: This project implements a stock price prediction model using a Recurrent Neural Network (RNN) in Python.

name: Vigenère Cipher Encryption and Decryption
desc: This project provides an implementation of the Vigenère cipher for encrypting and decrypting text.

name: Hand Tracking with OpenCV and MediaPipe
desc: This project demonstrates real-time hand tracking using OpenCV and MediaPipe.

name: Minimum Hotel Stays
desc: This project provides a solution to find the minimum number of hotel stays required to travel from the first city to the last city.

name: Double Pendulum Simulation
desc: This project simulates the dynamics of a double pendulum system.

name: LoRa ESP32 Communication
desc: This repository contains code and instructions for setting up a communication system using LoRa and ESP32.

name: Simple Relay LoRa ESP32
desc: This project demonstrates a simple communication system using LoRa modules (RFM95) with Arduino.

name: Lora Esp32 Send Date
desc: This project demonstrates a communication system using LoRa modules (RFM95) with Arduino and DHT11 sensors.

name: Lora Esp32 ThingSpeak
desc: This project demonstrates a LoRa communication setup using multiple nodes transmitting temperature and humidity data to a central server.

name: University Management System
desc: This project is a Flask-based web application designed to manage various aspects of a university.

name: Heathguard
desc: Advanced Environmental and Health Monitoring System with ESP32.

name: ESP32 BT TempRelay
desc: ESP32-based Bluetooth temperature and humidity monitoring system with relay control.

name: PHP Server Webserver ESP32
desc: This project is an iot-based solution for monitoring environmental conditions using an ESP32 microcontroller.

name: Binary Tree Subtree Analysis
desc: This repository contains a Python implementation for constructing a binary tree from a given input, analyzing the maximum subtree sum, and finding the path to the node with the maximum subtree sum.

name: Q Interpreter
desc: Q+ Interpreter: A custom postfix notation calculator implemented in Python.

name: Face Recognition Attendance System
desc: This project is a face recognition-based attendance system that uses a webcam to capture and recognize faces.

name: iot Temperature and Humidity Monitor with ESP32
desc: This project is an iot-based solution for monitoring temperature and humidity using an ESP32 microcontroller.
